posts.name: Sarang Tambe
posts.cooked:
I’m not able to figure out what is Graded Assignment 0. All it does is to take it to Course Introduction page for the course, but there are no questions on that page.

image1571×418 31.8 KB

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
This is what the page should look like.

Screenshot 2024-09-23 at 20.00.161015×535 48.1 KB

posts.name: Rajya Lakshmi Jampani
posts.cooked: The page doesn’t show whether our previous submission was successful or not. Everytime we open, it just shows a set of unsolved questions.

posts.name: Anand S
posts.cooked: It does, now. Thanks for the feedback, @rajyalakshmi

posts.name: Rajat Goel
posts.cooked:
Screenshot 2024-09-24 at 4.12.25 AM1920×661 39.5 KB

This is what i am getting. Am i missing something?

posts.name: Anand S
posts.cooked: I probably missed something, @22f3002293 - could you please try again with a hard refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R)? I’ve enabled error logging now via Sentry so I should be able to see the error you face when you refresh. Thanks!

link_counts.title: Application Performance Monitoring & Error Tracking Software

posts.name: Srujan Patwardhan
posts.cooked: Even I am getting the same error. The data and the assignment is not visible.

posts.name: Anand S
posts.cooked: Could you please share a screenshot of the errors on your DevTools console @22f3001954

posts.name: Vaishnavi H
posts.cooked: same problem as above GA0 not showing up

posts.name: Yash Rastogi
posts.cooked: PSA, disable ad blockers like uBlock or the Shield feature in the Brave browser, as Sentry might be blocked by these. Then hard refresh.

posts.name: Anand S
posts.cooked: I believe it’s resolved, now (by making Google’s auth library load asynchronously.) @23f1000075 and @22F3002354 – could you please check?

posts.name: Srujan Patwardhan
posts.cooked: Problem solved sir, using Chrome browser instead of Brave. Thanks!

posts.name: Sarang Tambe
posts.cooked: Thank you Sir, my problem is also solved with this.
